headline: Delta, American Airlines Increase Flights To Cushion Delays Caused By Trump's Restrictions On Carribean Operations Following Venezuela Raid
summary: Delta Airlines Inc. (NASDAQ:DAL), American Airlines Group Inc. (NASDAQ:AAL) have added several additional flights as thousands of travelers were left stranded in the Caribbean amid flight restrictions imposed by the President Donald Trump administration after it carried out a raid in Venezuela that led to the capture of President Nicolás Maduro. Students Left Stranded Due To Cancellations Students returning to school were left stranded due to the uncertainty around flights, Business Insider repo

headline: Former Meta Scientist Says Mark Zuckerberg's New AI Chief Is 'Young' And 'Inexperienced'—Warns 'Lot Of People' Who Haven't Yet Left Meta 'Will Leave'

headline: ARIS Announces New CEO to Lead Agentic AI-led Strategy
summary: GERMANY, January 07, 2026--CEO Appointment ARIS, a global leader in process intelligence and transformation software, today announced the appointment of Guillaume Bacuvier as Chief Executive Officer. Guillaume will lead ARIS through its next phase of growth as a fully standalone company, accelerating its evolution from a market leader in Process Intelligence into a foundational platform for enterprises deploying and governing Agentic AI.

content.title: ARIS Announces New CEO to Lead Agentic AI-led Strategy
content.summary: GERMANY, January 07, 2026--CEO Appointment ARIS, a global leader in process intelligence and transformation software, today announced the appointment of Guillaume Bacuvier as Chief Executive Officer. Guillaume will lead ARIS through its next phase of growth as a fully standalone company, accelerating its evolution from a market leader in Process Intelligence into a foundational platform for enterprises deploying and governing Agentic AI.

summary: If you are wondering whether Alphabet's share price still makes sense after its long run, looking at how the market is valuing the business today can help you frame that question more clearly. Alphabet closed at US$314.34, with returns of 0.4% over the last 7 days, 0.2% over the last 30 days, a 0.3% decline year to date, and 62.7% over the past year, as well as 246.1% over 3 years and 262.5% over 5 years. headline: AI ‘Fatigue’ Leaves Investors Focused on S&P’s Other 493 Stocks
summary: A growing number of investors are now wagering that run, led by the Magnificent Seven, is about to end.  Mounting concerns about AI’s ability to deliver seismic changes on the American economy — and the fat profits that would come with them — has turned investor euphoria about the technology into agita.  “I call it ‘AI fatigue,’” said Ed Yardeni, president and chief investment strategist at the eponymous Yardeni Research.

content.title: AI ‘Fatigue’ Leaves Investors Focused on S&P’s Other 493 Stocks

Mounting concerns about AI’s ability to deliver seismic changes on the American economy — and the fat profits that would come with them — has turned investor euphoria about the technology into agita.  “I call it ‘AI fatigue,’” said Ed Yardeni, president and chief investment strategist at the eponymous Yardeni Research.

headline: Dave Ramsey Says If You Weren't a 'Slave' To Credit Card, Car Debt, You Could Walk Out Of Your 9-To-5 The Next Time Your Boss Acts Like A 'Jerk'
summary: Personal finance expert Dave Ramsey says cutting all monthly debt and credit card payments lets you save more and gives you the freedom to leave a job you dislike. Discussing how debt and credit card payments trap people on "The Ramsey Show," he urged his audience to picture a life without loans, credit card bills, or a mortgage. headline: Semafor hits $330 million valuation in latest fundraise to fuel global expansion
summary: Semafor said on Wednesday it has closed a $30 million financing round, valuing the digital media ​startup at $330 million post-money, after its first profitable year. Semafor's ‌latest funding round saw participation from existing investors, along with new backers including ‌PSP, Belgian entrepreneur Thomas Leysen and K Group. Semafor, however, said it generated $2 million in earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization on revenue of $40 million last year, marking its first year of profitability.

content.title: Semafor hits $330 million valuation in latest fundraise to fuel global expansion
content.summary: Semafor said on Wednesday it has closed a $30 million financing round, valuing the digital media ​startup at $330 million post-money, after its first profitable year. Semafor's ‌latest funding round saw participation from existing investors, along with new backers including ‌PSP, Belgian entrepreneur Thomas Leysen and K Group. Semafor, however, said it generated $2 million in earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization on revenue of $40 million last year, marking its first year of profitability.
